required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Cordyceps Sinensis Mycelium Culture Extract(Paecilomyces Hepiali, CBG-CS-2) on Promotion of Immunity

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators performed randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled human trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Cordyceps sinensis mycelium culture extract (Paecilomyces hepiali, CBG-CS-2) on promotion of immunity. The investigators measured promotion of immunity parameters , including Cytotoxicity, Cytokine (IL-1β, IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IL-12, IFN-γ, TNF-α).

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in serum natural killer cell activity

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in Cytokine(IL-1β, IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IL-12, IFN-γ, TNF-α)

arm_group.description: Cordyceps sinensis mycelium culture extract 1.68 g

intervention.intervention_name: Cordyceps sinensis mycelium culture extract 1.68 g
intervention.description: Cordyceps sinensis mycelium culture extract 1.68 g

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Males and females 20-75 years old
- Able to give informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- WBC concentration below 3000 ㎕, over 8000㎕
- Subjects with BMI ＜ 18.5 kg/m2 at screening visit
- Allergic or hypersensitive to any of the ingredients in the test products
- Diagnosed of gastrointestinal disease such as Immune-related diseases, severe hepatic, renal failure, and diabetes
- History of reaction to any of the test products or of gastrointestinal diseases such as Crohn's disease or gastrointestinal surgery
- History of alcohol or substance abuse
- Participation in any other clinical trials within past 2 months
- Laboratory test, medical or psychological conditions deemed by the investigators to interfere with successful participation in the study
- Pregnant or lactating women etc.

facility.name: Clinical Trial Center for Functional Foods; Chonbuk National University Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator, Clinical Trial Center for Functional Foods
